description: A compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Perform 3 sets of 10 reps with a weight that challenges you but allows for good form.
A lower body exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes. Perform 3 sets of 12 reps with a weight that allows you to maintain proper form.
A balanced meal rich in protein and carbohydrates to aid recovery. Include lean protein (like chicken or fish), whole grains (like brown rice or quinoa), and plenty of vegetables.
A series of stretches and cool-down exercises to promote recovery after a workout.
A workout bench used for bench presses along with free weights for added resistance.
A squat rack used for performing squats and other barbell exercises.
